s0151.chinese: 獨羽怨秦破項 梁，奮勢，願與沛公西入關。
s0151.literal: Only Yu resented Qin for defeating Xiang Liang, exerted his influence, wished to go west into the pass with Pei Gong.
s0151.idiomatic: Only Xiang Yu, resentful that Qin had defeated Xiang Liang, exerted his influence and wished to march west through the pass with Lord Pei.

s0152.chinese: 懷王諸老將皆曰：「項羽為人慓悍禍賊，嘗攻襄城，襄城無唣類，所過無不殘滅。
s0152.literal: King Huai's various old generals all said: 'Xiang Yu as a person is fierce and violent, a calamitous bandit, once attacked Xiangcheng, Xiangcheng had no survivors, wherever he passed nothing was not completely destroyed.'
s0152.idiomatic: All of King Huai's veteran generals said, 'Xiang Yu is fierce and violent, a calamitous bandit. When he attacked Xiangcheng, he left no survivors. Everywhere he goes, he leaves nothing but complete destruction.'

s0153.chinese: 且楚數進取，前陳王、項梁皆敗，不如更遣長者扶義 而西，告諭秦父兄。
s0153.literal: Moreover Chu repeatedly advanced and took, previously King Chen, Xiang Liang all defeated, not as good as again send elder who upholds righteousness west, inform and persuade Qin fathers and elder brothers.
s0153.idiomatic: 'Moreover, Chu has repeatedly advanced and been defeated. King Chen and Xiang Liang both failed. It would be better to send an elder who upholds righteousness to march west and inform the Qin people.'

s0154.chinese: 秦父兄苦其主久矣，今誠得長者往，毋侵暴，宜可下。
s0154.literal: Qin fathers and elder brothers have suffered under their ruler for a long time, now truly if elder goes, do not invade violently, should be able to surrender.
s0154.idiomatic: 'The Qin people have suffered long under their ruler. If we send an elder who does not invade or commit violence, they should surrender.'

s0155.chinese: 項羽不可遣，獨沛公素寬大長者。」
s0155.literal: Xiang Yu cannot be sent, only Pei Gong is habitually magnanimous and elder.'
s0155.idiomatic: 'Xiang Yu cannot be sent. Only Lord Pei has always been magnanimous and virtuous.'

s0156.chinese: 卒不許羽，而遣沛公西收陳王、項梁散卒。
s0156.literal: In the end did not permit Yu, instead sent Pei Gong west to gather King Chen, Xiang Liang's scattered troops.
s0156.idiomatic: In the end, they did not permit Xiang Yu to go, but sent Lord Pei west to gather the scattered troops of King Chen and Xiang Liang.

s0157.chinese: 乃道碭至 陽城與杠里，攻秦軍壁，破其二軍。
s0157.literal: Then took the Dang road to Yangcheng and Gangli, attacked Qin army fortifications, broke their two armies.
s0157.idiomatic: He took the road through Dang to Yangcheng and Gangli, attacked the Qin army fortifications, and broke through two of their armies.

s0158.chinese: 秦三年十月，齊將田都畔田榮，將兵助項羽救趙。
s0158.literal: Qin third year tenth month, Qi general Tian Du rebelled against Tian Rong, led troops to assist Xiang Yu rescue Zhao.
s0158.idiomatic: In the tenth month of the third year of Qin, Qi general Tian Du rebelled against Tian Rong and led troops to assist Xiang Yu in rescuing Zhao.

s0159.chinese: 沛公攻破東郡尉於成武。
s0159.literal: Pei Gong attacked and defeated the Dongjun prefect at Chengwu.
s0159.idiomatic: Lord Pei attacked and defeated the prefect of Dongjun at Chengwu.

s0160.chinese: 十一月，項羽殺宋義，并其兵 渡河，自立為上將軍，諸將黥布等皆屬。
s0160.literal: Eleventh month, Xiang Yu killed Song Yi, merged his troops crossed the river, self-established as supreme general, various generals Ying Bu and others all belonged to him.
s0160.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, Xiang Yu killed Song Yi, took command of his troops, crossed the river, and proclaimed himself supreme commander. All the generals, including Ying Bu, came under his authority.

s0161.chinese: 十二月，沛公引兵至栗，遇剛武侯，奪其軍四千餘人，并之，與魏將皇欣、武滿軍合，攻秦軍，破之。
s0161.literal: Twelfth month, Pei Gong led troops to Li, encountered Gangwu Marquis, seized his army more than four thousand people, merged them, combined with Wei generals Huang Xin, Wu Man armies, attacked Qin army, defeated it.
s0161.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, Lord Pei led his troops to Li where he encountered the Marquis of Gangwu. He seized more than four thousand of his troops, then joined forces with Wei generals Huang Xin and Wu Man to attack the Qin army and defeat it.

s0162.chinese: 故齊王建孫田安下濟 北，從項羽救趙。
s0162.literal: Former Qi King Jian's grandson Tian An went down north of Ji, followed Xiang Yu to rescue Zhao.
s0162.idiomatic: Tian An, grandson of the former King Jian of Qi, crossed north of the Ji River and joined Xiang Yu to rescue Zhao.

s0163.chinese: 羽大破秦軍鉅鹿下，虜王離，走章邯。
s0163.literal: Yu greatly defeated Qin army below Julu, captured Wang Li, routed Zhang Han.
s0163.idiomatic: Xiang Yu inflicted a major defeat on the Qin army at Julu, captured Wang Li, and put Zhang Han to flight.

s0164.chinese: 二月，沛公從碭北攻昌邑，遇彭越。
s0164.literal: Second month, Pei Gong from north of Dang attacked Changyi, encountered Peng Yue.
s0164.idiomatic: In the second month, Lord Pei attacked Changyi from north of Dang and encountered Peng Yue.

s0165.literal: Yue helped attack Changyi, did not fall.
s0165.idiomatic: Peng Yue helped attack Changyi, but they could not capture it.

s0166.chinese: 沛公西過高陽，酈食其為里監門，曰：「諸將過 此者多，吾視沛公大度。」
s0166.literal: Pei Gong west passed Gaoyang, Li Yiji was village gatekeeper, said: 'Various generals who passed this place many, I observe Pei Gong has great magnanimity.'
s0166.idiomatic: As Lord Pei passed west through Gaoyang, Li Yiji, who was the village gatekeeper, said, 'Many generals have passed through here. I can see that Lord Pei has exceptional magnanimity.'

s0167.literal: Then requested to see Pei Gong.
s0167.idiomatic: He then requested an audience with Lord Pei.

s0168.chinese: 沛公方踞床，使兩女子洗。
s0168.literal: Pei Gong just then squatting on bed, made two women wash.
s0168.idiomatic: Lord Pei was lounging on a couch, having two women wash his feet.

s0169.chinese: 酈生不拜，長揖曰：「足下必欲誅無道秦，不宜踞見長者。」
s0169.literal: Li Sheng did not bow, gave long bow said: 'Your excellency certainly wishes to execute unrighteous Qin, should not lounge to see elders.'
s0169.idiomatic: Li Yiji did not bow but gave a slight nod and said, 'If Your Excellency truly wishes to overthrow the tyrannical Qin, you should not receive elders while lounging on a couch.'

s0170.chinese: 於是沛公起，攝衣謝之，延上坐。
s0170.literal: Thereupon Pei Gong rose, gathered clothes thanked him, invited to upper seat.
s0170.idiomatic: Lord Pei then rose, straightened his clothes, apologized, and invited Li Yiji to sit in the place of honor.

s0172.chinese: 沛公以為廣野君，以其弟商為將，將陳留兵。

s0174.chinese: 西與秦將楊熊會戰白馬，又戰曲遇東，大破之。

s0175.chinese: 楊熊走之滎陽，二世使使斬 之以徇。

s0178.chinese: 時趙別將司馬卬方欲渡河入關，沛公乃北攻平陰，絕河津。

s0179.chinese: 南，戰雒陽東，軍不利，從轘轅至陽城，收軍 中馬騎。

s0180.chinese: 六月，與南陽守齮戰犨東，大破之。

s0181.chinese: 略南陽郡，南陽守走，保城守宛。

s0183.chinese: 張良諫曰：「沛公雖欲急入關，秦兵尚眾，距險。

s0184.chinese: 今不下宛，宛從 後擊，彊秦在前，此危道也。」

s0185.chinese: 於是沛公乃夜引軍從他道還，偃旗幟，遲明，圍宛城三匝。

s0186.chinese: 南陽守欲自剄，其舍人陳恢曰：「死未晚也。」

s0187.chinese: 乃踰城見沛公，曰：「臣 聞足下約先入咸陽者王之，今足下留守宛。

s0188.chinese: 宛郡縣連城數十，其吏民自以為降必死，故皆堅守乘城。

s0189.chinese: 今足下盡日止攻，士死傷者必多；

s0191.chinese: 足下 前則失咸陽之約，後有彊宛之患。

s0192.chinese: 為足下計，莫若約降，封其守，因使止守，引其甲卒與之西。

s0193.chinese: 諸城未下者，聞聲爭開門而待足下，足下通行無所累。」

s0195.chinese: 七月，南陽守齮降，封為殷侯，封陳恢千戶。

s0197.chinese: 至丹水，高武侯鰓、襄侯王陵降。

s0198.chinese: 還攻胡陽，遇番君別將梅鋗，與偕攻析、酈，皆降。

s0199.chinese: 所 過毋得鹵掠，秦民喜。

s0201.chinese: 是月章邯舉軍降項羽，羽以為雍王。

s0204.chinese: 秦相趙高恐，乃殺二世，使人來，欲約分王關中，沛公不許。

s0205.chinese: 九月，趙高立二 世兄子子嬰為秦王。

s0206.chinese: 子嬰誅滅趙高，遣將將兵距嶢關。

s0207.chinese: 沛公欲擊之，張良曰：「秦兵尚彊，未可輕。

s0208.chinese: 願先遣人益張旗幟於山上為疑兵，使酈食其、陸賈往說秦將，啗 以利。」

s0209.chinese: 秦將果欲連和，沛公欲許之。

s0210.chinese: 張良曰：「此獨其將欲叛，恐其士卒不從，不如因其怠懈擊之。」

s0211.chinese: 沛公引兵繞嶢關，踰蕢山，擊秦軍，大破之藍田南。

s0212.chinese: 遂至藍 田，又戰其北，秦兵大敗。

s0213.chinese: 或說沛公曰：「秦富十倍天下，地形彊。

s0214.chinese: 今聞章邯降項羽，羽號曰雍王，王關中。

s0215.chinese: 即來，沛公恐不得有 此。

s0216.chinese: 可急使守函谷關，毋內諸侯軍，稍徵關中兵以自益，距之。」

s0218.chinese: 十二月，項羽果帥諸侯兵欲西入關，關門閉。

s0219.chinese: 聞沛公已定關中，羽大怒，使黥 布等攻破函谷關，遂至戲下。

s0220.chinese: 沛公左司馬曹毋傷聞羽怒，欲攻沛公，使人言羽曰：「沛公欲王關中，令子嬰相，珍寶盡有之。」

s0222.chinese: 亞父范增說羽曰：「沛公 居山東時，貪財好色，今聞其入關，珍物無所取，婦女無所幸，此其志不小。

s0223.chinese: 吾使人望其氣，皆為龍，成五色，此天子氣。

s0226.chinese: 是時，羽兵四十萬，號百萬。

s0227.chinese: 沛公兵十萬，號二十萬，力不敵。

s0228.chinese: 會羽季父左尹項伯素善張良，夜馳見張良，具告其實，欲與俱去，毋特俱死。

s0229.chinese: 良曰：「臣為韓王送沛 公，不可不告，亡去不義。」

s0231.chinese: 沛公與伯約為婚姻，曰：「吾入關，秋豪無所敢取，籍吏民，封府庫，待將軍。

s0233.chinese: 日夜望將 軍到，豈敢反邪！

s0236.chinese: 戒沛公曰：「旦日不可不早自來謝。」

s0237.chinese: 項伯還，具以沛公言告羽，因曰：「沛公不先破關中兵，公巨 能入乎？

s0238.chinese: 且人有大功，擊之不祥，不如因善之。」

s0240.chinese: 沛公旦日從百餘騎見羽鴻門，謝曰：「臣與將軍戮力攻秦，將軍戰河北，臣戰河南，不自意先入關，能破秦，與將軍復相見。

s0241.chinese: 今者有小人言，令將軍與臣有隙。」

s0242.chinese: 羽曰：「此沛公左司馬曹毋傷言之，不然，籍何以生此？」

s0244.chinese: 范增數目羽擊沛公，羽不應。

s0246.chinese: 君王為人不忍，汝入以劍舞，因擊沛公，殺之。

s0249.chinese: 壽畢，曰：「軍中無 以為樂，請以劍舞。」
